title: Advanced Structural Concrete
description: Properties of reinforcing steels; concrete technology; creep, shrinkage and relaxation; Mohr-Coulomb failure criteria for concrete; confinement, moment curvature and force-displacement responses; plastic design; code compliant seismic design philosophy; code compliant seismic design of structural walls. Use of computer resources. Recommended preparation: SE 151A and SE 151B or equivalent background in basic RC/PC design. Prerequisites: department approval or consent of instructor.
